name: alizharb/laravel-themer
description: A professional theme management system for Laravel 11/12 with first-class Livewire 4 support, strict typing, and zero-config modular integration.

suggest.alizharb/laravel-modular: Enables theme discovery within modular structures and provides zero-config autoloading for modules.
suggest.alizharb/laravel-modular-livewire: Provides automatic Livewire component discovery and registration within modules.
suggest.alizharb/laravel-modular-filament: Enables Filament v5 admin panel integration with automatic discovery in modules.
suggest.alizharb/laravel-modular-js: Enables JavaScript discovery within modular structures and provides zero-config autoloading for modules.
suggest.alizharb/filament-themer-luncher: Provides a comprehensive Filament v5 interface for managing and switching themes.
suggest.alizharb/filament-modular-luncher: A powerful Filament v5 manager for listing, toggling, and backing up system modules.
suggest.alizharb/laravel-hooks: Adds a universal extensibility and plugin system for Laravel applications.
